forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: text to speech tone and pitch

comments.text: is it possible to change text to speech pitch or and tone?
yes, please use "when starts then set voice..." to see the options for adjusting pitch and more! let us know if it works for you

thread.latestCommentText: yes, please use "when starts then set voice..." to see the options for adjusting! let us know if it works for you
